title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1603/95 of 3 July 1995 reducing the basic and buying-in prices for cauliflowers, peaches, nectarines and lemons until the end of the 1995/96 marketing year as a result of the overrun in the intervention thresholds fixed for the 1994/95 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1603/95 of 3 July 1995 reducing the basic and buying-in  prices for cauliflowers, peaches, nectarines and lemons until the end of the 1995/96 marketing year  as a result of the overrun in the intervention thresholds fixed for the 1994/95 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The basic and buying-in prices for cauliflowers, peaches, nectarines  and lemons for the 1995/96 marketing year as fixed by Regulation (EC) No 1542/95 are hereby reduced  by 5  % in the case of cauliflowers, 20  % in the case of peaches, 20  % in the case of nectarines  and 10  % in the case of lemons and shall be as set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 July 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
BASIC AND BUYING-IN PRICES FOR THE 1995/96 MARKETING YEAR FOLLOWING THE OVERRUN IN  THE INTERVENTION THRESHOLDS FIXED FOR THE 1994/95 MARKETING YEAR
1.  Cauliflowers >TABLE>
2.  Peaches >TABLE>
3.  Nectarines >TABLE>
4.  Lemons >TABLE>
These prices do not take account of the cost of the packaging in which the product is put up.
